job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtCompany OverviewltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtOur founding team has extensive experience in building researching and selling machine learning products and came together in search of a product that could leverage these skills for positive impact Now weve set out to build software that works to address the generation defining issue of economic inequality in the face of climate changeampnbsp We are running head first at the 150B coverage gap that faces the insurance industry as increasingly frequent and severe weather events challenge the status quoltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe problems we wrestle with every day are ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtRethinking the first principles of state of the art predictive and optimization mechanismsltligtltligtDoing so in a multicloud infrastructure environment with significant security constraintsltligtltligtEnabling a lightweight lowlatency and consumable UX despite the complexityampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtThe team is looking for talented driven and above all caring individuals to join us in that journeyampnbspampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtDemonstrated interest in engineering for impactltligtltligt2 years of handson industry experience in full stack  data engineeringltligtltligtEvent backbone and job pool platforms Kafka etcltligtltligtWillingness to get hands dirty across a broad variety of internal and client softwareltligtltligt2 years of experience with React Python Django  Flask and NodejsltligtltligtDemonstrated ability to pick up new technologies quickly and learn on the flyltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtNiceToHavesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtUndergraduate or Graduate work in a related fieldltligtltligtExperience with ML or optimizationltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
